==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=21}}

===Etymology===
From {{der|zh|pt|Portugal}} or {{der|zh|la|Portugallia}}, possibly via {{etyl|nan|zh}} {{zh-m|葡萄牙|Phû-tô-gâ}}. The selection of {{zh-m|葡萄|grape}} in the phonetic transcription alludes to the importance of [[viniculture]] to the early Portuguese missionaries to China, who used grapes to make [[sacramental]] [[wine]] ({{zh-m|葡萄酒}}).

Compare {{zh-m|西班牙|Spain}}.
